locations.name: Birds eye view
locations.description: Here you can see part of the southern alps in New Zealand, surrounding the Fox / Te Moeka o Tuawe and Frans Josef / Kā Roimata o Hine Hukatere glaciers

locations.name: Fox Glacier
locations.description: The blue shading shows the extent of the glacier ice in 1978 for Fox glacier / Te Moeka o Tuawe

locations.name: Fox Glacier
locations.description: Here, you can see how the glacier has retreated, with the shading now showing the 2016 boundaries

locations.name: Franz Josef Glacier
locations.description: Again, the blue shading shows the extent of Frans Josef glacier / Kā Roimata o Hine Hukatere in 1978

locations.name: Franz Josef Glacier
locations.description: Here you can see the coverage in 2016
